title: Quant-UX
dialog.login.password.label: Password
dialog.login.tos.error: You must accept the terms of service & privacy policy!
dialog.login.privacy.error: You must accept the privacy notice
testSettingsTaskAddHint: Click the  "Add Task" button to create a new task. The tasks a shown to the users before the test.
testSettingDesPlaceholder: Add a short description for the users in here
testSettingTaskDelete1: Do you want to delete the task '
dashTaskEmpty: Click the  "Add Task" button to create a new analytic task. Edit the flow to measure task performance.
taskRecorder1: A flow is the sequence of interactions the users have to perform to complete a task.
taskRecorderStep1: Perform the interactions your users should perform
taskRecorderStep2: You can press Pause to pause the recording
taskRecorderStep3: Press Done when the flow is complete.
taskRecorderStep4: Select all steps that are important for the task.
taskRecorderError1: You have not recorded any flow. Did you press the Record button?
taskRecorderDoNotAllow: Do not allow events in between.
videoTablePlanUpdateMsg: To see all videos upgate your plan.
test.welcome.headline: Welcome!
test.welcome.intro.1: You were invited for a usability test of the
test.welcome.intro.tasks: You can try out the prototype and perform certain tasks. When you click on Show Tasks button, you will receive detailed instructions.
test.welcome.intro.no.tasks: You can try out the prototype by clicking on the Start Prototype button.
test.welcome.intro.privacy: Please be aware that your interaction will be recored to make the design better. We do not store any personal information about you.
test.task.headline: Tasks
test.task.description: In the scope of this usability test you are kindly requested to perform the tasks listed below. Don't worry if you can not fulfill all tasks. This is just a sign that the prototype needs further improvements. The tasks are:
test.task.footer: You can try out the prototype by clicking on the Start Prototype button.
test.qr.headline: Scan the QR code with your mobile device.
test.welcome.privacy: This is a usability test and your interaction will be stored to make the design better. We do not store any personal information about you.
app.error.server.offline.title: Ooops
app.error.server.offline.msg: You have been gone for more than 30 minutes. To continue working, please log in again.
user.plan.update.ok: Your request was sent to our sales staff
user.plan.requested.msg: We are processing your request. Please check your email for payment instructions.
user.plan.error.msg.team: You need to upgrade your account to add more team members
user.plan.error.msg.apps: You need to upgarde your account to create more prototypes
user.plan.error.msg.tasks: You need to upgarde your account to create more tasks
user.plan.error.msg.test: You need to upgarde your account to analyse all tests!
user.plan.error.msg.analytics: You need to upgarde your account to analyse all tests!
user.retire.msg: are you sure that you want to delete your account? You will loose all your data.
user.retire.cusoon: Thanks for using Quant-UX. We hope to see you soon again.
team.plan.add.plan.error: You plan does not allow to add more users.
analytics.plan.update.msg: You need to upgarde your account to analyse all tests!
share.Headline: Share this app
dash.perf.hint.scatter: Each dot presents a successful user test. Select them to get more information.
dash.perf.hint.session.msg: To replay the session recording press
dash.perf.no.flow.title: No FLow
dash.perf.no.flow.msg:
Please define a flow with more than two steps.
Otherwise we cannot show details about the task performance.
